post:
![](http://mycustomhosting.net/img/logo.png)<br />

About **My Custom Hosting**<br />
My Custom Hosting was registered back in 2009 and has been providing hosting to customers for almost 8 years.  We aim to offer your the most features at the lowest price possible. With multiple offsite backup locations, CloudFlare, Softaculous and Nginx+Varnish, and now OpenVZ and KVM VPS, we feel we are almost there but if you have any suggestions to a feature we should add to our line-up please let us know!<br />

Exclusive **LET Offer Details**<br />
4 GB  RAM Guaranteed<br />
5 GB RAM Burstable<br />
100 GB SSD Cached Disk Space<br />
1000 GB Transfer<br />
1 IPv4 + 5 IPv6<br />
4 CPU Cores (Shared)<br />

$7 **monthly!**  [Order Here](https://billing.mycustomhosting.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=34)!<br />
